queries.sqlQuery:
select
	name Name,
	countryId Country,
	r3 + r4 + r5 Sum,
	r3 '3x3',
	r4 '4x4',
	r5 '5x5'
from
	(
	select
		id,
		p.name,
		p.countryId,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '333') r3,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '444') r4,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '555') r5
	from
		Persons p) r
where
	r3 is not null
	and r4 is not null
	and r5 is not null
order by
	Sum asc
limit 10
queries.sqlQueryCustom:
select
	name Name,
	countryId Country,
	r3 + r4 + r5 Sum,
	r3 '3x3',
	r4 '4x4',
	r5 '5x5'
from
	(
	select
		id,
		p.name,
		p.countryId,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '333') r3,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '444') r4,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksSingle
		where
			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '555') r5
	from
		Persons p) r
where
	r3 is not null
	and r4 is not null
	and r5 is not null
	and id = ':WCA_ID'
order by
	Sum asc
limit 10

queries.sqlQuery:
select
	name Name,
	countryId Country,
	r3 + r4 + r5 Sum,
	r3 '3x3',
	r4 '4x4',
	r5 '5x5'
from
	(
	select
		id,
		p.name,
		p.countryId,
		(
		select
			worldRank
		from
			RanksAverage

			personId = p.id
			and eventId = '333') r3,
